Summary: bright constant white light. erratic flight path, 2 airoplanes seemed to pass close to object
trends: There have been no other sightings in Radlett
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi went outside for a cigarette and noticed a very bright light move slowly and erraticly in the sky. the light was brighter than any star\planet i have seen before. it appeared to be a single constant, unwavering light, no blips or flashes. i see lots of planes as luton airport about 20 miles north and heathrow about 20 miles south west. this was not a plane. 2 planes were visible during the sighting and i could clearly see the flashing lights on them. the light was visible before the planes and made no apparent sound. have seen many helicopters and you tend to hear them, they also have flashing lights which this did not. i enjoy watching the night sky so am familiar with planets such as venus which is sometimes visible, but this was far brighter and moving in a irregular way. stars and planets do not move this way. this thing was not static. the light was as bright as the moon only smaller but bigger than any star and unwavering. i noticed the object because it was so bright and the fact it was moving made it very distinctive. i watched it for about 30 seconds before 2 planes crossed the sky. they would have seen it without a doubt.the object was visible for another couple of minutes before fading into the distance. i was tempted to run in for camera but i only have cameraphone so it would not have picked anything up in night time conditions besides i wanted to watch this strange event. i could not guess size or distance of the object.
